GISRUK Session Overview
---------------

This page contains a list of all papers, organised into their sessions. For a searchable programme, or to find out when your session has been timetabled for, see the <a href="./programme.html">main programme</a>. 

<!-- Note: this html source is generated by a script on Nick's computer:  ~/research/conferences/GISRUK2015/programme/handbook/make_session_overview.py -->

</tr>

</tr>
